Class BackupSessionTask

java.lang.Object

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.util.concurrent.Callable<de.javakaffee.web.msm.SessionTrackerValve.SessionBackupService.BackupResultStatus>
public class BackupSessionTask
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.concurrent.Callable<de.javakaffee.web.msm.SessionTrackerValve.SessionBackupService.BackupResultStatus>

Stores the provided session in memcached if the session was modified or if the session needs to be relocated (set force to true).

Constructor Summary

Parameters:
session - the session to save
force - specifies, if the session needs to be saved by all means, e.g. as it has to be relocated to another memcached node (the session id had been changed before in this case).
